title: Shriram Housing Finance looks to double loan-book to Rs 10,000 cr by FY24 - Economic Times
content: Shriram Housing Finance looks to double loan-book to Rs 10,000 cr by FY24  Economic Times
description: With a little over Rs 5,000 crore of live loan-book as of February, Shriram Housing is the fifth largest affordable housing lender now.
